Coarse-to-Fine Inference for Probabilistic Programs
  • Editor

Coarse-to-Fine Inference

This set of notes contains work-in-progress on applying coarse-to-fine inference techniques to probabilistic programs. To make edits, push commits to the gh-pages branch of the (private) coarse-to-fine repository.
